title: The Solution to Unrequited
description: Atomic number: 33 Name of chemical element: Arsenic Symbol: As  Every solution has a poisonous flaw … even between best friends.  The agreement: Fall break together. The struggle: A road trip from North Carolina to Massachusetts. The reason: To find a way back into each other’s lives. The issue: AJ’s not ready to let Evan reclaim the parts of her he made his. The hindrance: Connecticut.  The Solution to Unrequited, Book two in the Science of Unrequited: The Story of AJ & Evan.
author: Len  Webster
